column4: X... configure: error: Can't find X includes. Please check your ins                                                                           tallation and add the correct paths!
built in ftp support for nautilus or else gftp
sorry, you need to have universe enabled
see the ubuntuguide.org on how to add repositories
then dump kde and use gnome
just kill it with Ctrl + C, it will resume where it left off
edit ~/.xmms/config, find the line that says output_plugin=something and make sure it says output_plugin=/usr/lib/xmms/Output/libesdout.so
you should check out beep-media-player too, it's a gtk2 pot of xmms, which means it looks better :)
and you also need to applay this fix to the configfile :)
